mapper.insert: insert into users(account_id, name, token, gmt_create, gmt_modified, bio) values (#{accountId}, #{name}, #{token}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModified}, #{bio});
mapper.select: select t.id as id, t.account_id as accountId, t.name as name, t.token as token, t.gmt_create as gmtCreate, t.gmt_modified as gmtModified, t.bio as bio from users t where token = #{token};
